Author: vlad
Content: When a company has millions of users among their other services, and they decide to cut one to focus on the others, I don't think that's failure at all.

Author: jamescoops
Content: isn't this the guy who used to do Mobilecrunch - if so dont hold your breath - he didnt used to post much and what he did post was dull.

Author: 7media
Title: 202(c) the anti hacking German law
Content: 202(c) came into effect on Sunday, which states that any illegal distribution, sale, and possession of security tools that encourages to commit a crime such as hacking.

Author: jamongkad
Content: Well reading the article and the comments it looks as if Feedlounge is a subscription based online RSS reader. Hmmm with the number of free alternatives if looks as if they were going to have a hard time in the first place. I don't think it's fair to put the blame solely on 37 Signals for their demise.
